          <title>
            <string language="es">Combinación lineal de vectores</string>
            <string language="en">Linear combinations of vectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lineare Kombinationen von Vektoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combinaisons linéaires des vecteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinações lineares dos vetores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combinazioni lineari dei vettori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμικοί συνδυασμοί διανυσμάτων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite poner un vector plano como combinación lineal de otros dos, geométrica y analíticamente</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to create a plane vector geometrically and analytically which is a linear combination of two vectors</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">analítica</string>
            <string language="en">analytic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">vector</string>
            <string language="en">vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">combinación</string>
            <string language="en">combination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, 
einen flachen Vektor geometrisch und analytisch zu erstellen, der eine
lineare Kombination von zwei Vektoren ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui permet à l'utilisateur
de créer un vecteur plat géométriquement et analytiquement qui est 
une combinaison linéaire de deux vecteurs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que permite que o usuário 
críe um vetor plano geomètrica e analìticamente que seja uma 
combinação linear de dois vetores</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente 
crei geometricamente ed analiticamente un vettore piano che è una 
combinazione lineare di due vettori</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
δημιουργήσει ένα διάνυσμα αεροπλάνων γεωμετρικά και αναλυτικά 
που είναι ένας γραμμικός συνδυασμός δύο διανυσμάτων</string>
          </description>
